about_the_game:
About Super Tigerio：
In the game, the player will take on the role of Tigerio,
Who will have to jump through obstacles on the path and attack to kill the monsters to get the gold Cup
The player's task in the game is to move the character from the left side of the screen to the right side to reach the gold cup at the end of each level.
During the journey, there will be some mushrooms and hidden coins in the question marks, collect them to give the player more lives or more fireball to defeat the monsters.
Note that the player will lose your life if the player touches the monster and fall down the abyss.
The DLC have full 10 missions.
detailed_description:
About Super Tigerio：
In the game, the player will take on the role of Tigerio,
Who will have to jump through obstacles on the path and attack to kill the monsters to get the gold Cup
The player's task in the game is to move the character from the left side of the screen to the right side to reach the gold cup at the end of each level.
During the journey, there will be some mushrooms and hidden coins in the question marks, collect them to give the player more lives or more fireball to defeat the monsters.
Note that the player will lose your life if the player touches the monster and fall down the abyss.
The DLC have full 10 missions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(r) Core (TM)2 CPU -T7200 @ 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Raedon X1600 / Nvidia GeForce 8600M GT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
